item.title: Dr. K. Rajibul Islam
item.description: Assistant Professor, Institute for Quantum Computing and Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of Waterloo UW Physics and Astronomy profile , IQC Profile , CV Affiliate Scientist, TRIUMF and Perimeter Institute for Theoretical Physics Academic Tree Notable recognitions President’s Excellence in Research Award, University of Waterloo (2020) Recognized by the Department of Physics and Astronomy for outstanding teaching (2019, ‘20) Early Researcher Award, Ontario Government (2019) Distinguished PhD Dissertation Award, University of Maryland (2012-13) Teaching PHYS 234 (Quantum Physics I, Winter 2019, ‘20, ‘21) PHYS 393 (Physical Optics, Winter 2020) PHYS 256 (Geometrical and Physical Optics, Fall 2017, ‘18) Outreach Dr.
